content: **crochet strawberry pattern quick and cute summer project** this easy crochet strawberry pattern works up in just minutes perfect for beginners and great for using up small yarn scraps you can crochet a single strawberry or make a matching set use your finished strawberries to create fun summer earrings a cute pendant necklace or even a whimsical charm for your purse or keychain these little berries add a cheerful handmade touch to any accessory **this listing is for a digital crochet pattern not a finished item ** **unique features-** easy level pattern suitable for beginners crocheted in 3 dimensions for a realistic look lightweight and comfortable to wear perfect for summer accessorizing **materials needed-** hook 3mm us size 2 5 yarn friends cotton 8/4 mercerized fingering weight gauges 3 stitches x 4 row = 4 inches in single_crochet in 0 5 inch 3 stitches x 4 row = 4 inches in single_crochet 3 stitches by 4 row = 4 inches in single_crochet in 0 5 inch **grab the free pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry ** **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of
